text: Ɓen (Malaa'ikaaɓe) roondiiɓe Arsiki kin, e wonɓe bannge makki ɓen, hiɓe subbunhinora yettugol Joomi maɓɓe, ɓe gomɗina Mo, ɓe insinorana gomɗimɓe ɓen (wiide): "Joomi amen, A yaññirii kala huunde, yurmeende e ganndal. Yawtan ɓen tuubuɓe, ɓe jokki laawol Maa ngol, daɗndaa ɓe kadi lepte Dulɓoowe ngen
